original_text:
Hotline 2
Amanti del poliziesco, la NetEnt propone per voi una nuova versione della amatissima slot Hotline! Siete pronti a seguire le tracce dei detective?
Tema e grafica
La software house svedese NetEnt è uno dei migliori provider presenti sul mercato al momento attuale e rappresenta un punto di riferimento quando si cercano slot machine dal taglio classico ma caratterizzate da un’altissima qualità.
Anche Hotline 2 si caratterizza per una linea classica e al contempo assai efficace, sia come tematica, sia come compartimento grafico.
Hotline 2 è ambientata nientemeno che a Miami e si, come tematica è decisamente vicina alla nota serie tv in voga negli anni ’80 Miami Vice. Anche qui troviamo due detective che somigliano proprio a Crockett e Tubbs, alle prese con un furto operato dalla bellissima ladra di preziosi Kitty Weiss.
I tre protagonisti del gioco li troviamo sia nella schermata iniziale sia come simboli sui rulli, immersi in uno sfondo tipico della Miami al tramonto, con lunghe strade e le immancabili palme. I colori utilizzati non sono pieni ma un po’smorzati, il che rende la grafica non solo molto gradevole ma anche rilassante.
La NetEnt aveva già pubblicato una slot machine chiamata Hotline, in cui la tematica e la grafica erano molto simili, questa nuova versione differisce dalla prima soprattutto per quanto riguarda il gameplay, con delle nuove funzioni speciali che si aggiungono alle cosiddette “hotline” che hanno reso popolare il gioco.
Caratteristiche principali della slot machine
La struttura di gioco di Hotline 2 è quella tradizionale con cinque rulli e tre righe. Le modalità di vincita sono 243, ma possono aumentare fino a 1.944 quando si giocano i giri gratuiti.
Per ogni giro è possibile effettuare le proprie puntate a partire da un minimo di 10 centesimi fino a un massimo di 50 €.
La volatilità di questa nuova versione di Hotline è media: capiterà certamente di ottenere delle piccole vincite abbastanza costanti, ma per ottenere i premi più sostanziosi sarà necessario armarsi di un pochino di pazienza! Non demordete e potrete essere ripagati con la vincita massima che è pari a ben 5.184 volte il valore della vostra puntata!
Il ritorno teorico al giocatore (RTP) di Hotline 2 si attesta su un 96 %, perfettamente nella media!
Simboli e funzionalità di Hotline 2
I simboli che potrete trovare sui rulli di questa slot dal sapore poliziesco di casa NetEnt sono interamente tematici e comprendono una serie di gioielli rubati, i detective e la bella ladra, che tra tutti rappresenta l’icona che regala vincite più alte.
Il simbolo Wild raffigura invece due auto da corsa, sostituisce tutti i simboli tranne lo Scatter per completare delle combinazioni vincenti e se si ferma su una Hotline si espande e copre tutto il rullo.
Lo Scatter è un fenicottero, compare solo sui rulli 2, 3 e 4 e regala 7 giri gratuiti.
La caratteristica peculiare del gioco è la presenza delle Hotline, una funzione Bonus che permette di espandere i simboli sui rulli e aumentare le possibilità di vincita.

raw_translation.response:
Hotline 2:

If you're a fan of police dramas, NetEnt has a treat for you with the new version of the beloved slot game Hotline! Ready to follow the detectives' trail?

Theme and Graphics:

NetEnt is one of the best software providers on the market, a reference point for those looking for classic slot machines characterized by high quality. Hotline 2 has a classic and effective line, both in terms of theme and graphics. Set in Miami, the theme is reminiscent of the popular '80s TV series Miami Vice. The two detectives, who resemble Crockett and Tubbs, are on the trail of the beautiful thief Kitty Weiss, and they are all present as symbols on the reels. The colors used are muted, making it not only visually pleasing but also relaxing.

Features:

Hotline 2 has a traditional game structure with five reels and three rows. There are 243 ways to win, but this can increase to 1,944 during free spins rounds. Bets can be placed from a minimum of 10 cents up to a maximum of 50 €. The volatility is medium, meaning that small but frequent wins are expected, and the maximum payout is 5,184 times the value of your bet. The RTP is an excellent 96%.

Symbols and Functions:

The symbols on the reels are all thematic and includes stolen jewels, detectives, and the beautiful thief, who has the highest payout. The Wild symbol represents two racing cars and can replace all other symbols except the Scatter to complete winning combinations. If it lands on a Hotline, it expands and covers the entire reel. The Scatter symbol is a flamingo and appears only on reels 2, 3, and 4, awarding you with seven free spins. The unique feature of the game is the presence of Hotlines. These are bonus functions that allow symbols to expand on the reels, increasing your chances of winning.

raw_translation.response:
Hotline 2
For all you crime lovers out there, NetEnt has released a new version of the beloved Hotline slot game! Are you ready to follow the detectives' clues?
Theme and Graphics
NetEnt, the Swedish software company, is one of the best providers in the current market and sets the standard for classic-themed slots with high-quality graphics.
Hotline 2 has a classic but highly effective design, both thematically and graphically. Set in Miami, the slot is reminiscent of the popular 80s TV series Miami Vice. The game features two detectives, resembling Crockett and Tubbs, on the trail of a notorious thief named Kitty Weiss.
The three main characters are present both on the initial screen and as symbols on the reels, with a typical Miami sunset background featuring long streets and palm trees. The colors used are subdued, which not only makes for an appealing graphic design but also creates a relaxing atmosphere.
NetEnt had previously released a slot game called Hotline with similar thematics and graphics. This new version differs primarily in gameplay, introducing new special features along with the "hotlines" that made the game famous.
Main Features of the Slot Game
Hotline 2 follows the traditional slot game structure with five reels and three rows. The game has 243 ways to win, with potential increases up to 1,944 during free spins.
Players can bet a minimum of 10 cents up to a maximum of €50 per spin.
The game's volatility is moderate, and players are likely to secure consistent small wins, but patience is required for substantial payouts. Keep playing, and you could win up to 5,184 times the value of your bet!
Hotline 2 also has a theoretical return to player (RTP) rate of 96%, perfectly average for slot games.
Symbols and Functions of Hotline 2
The symbols on the reels of this crime-themed slot game from NetEnt are entirely thematic and include a range of stolen jewels, detectives, and the alluring thief Kitty Weiss, who offers the highest payouts.
The Wild symbol features two race cars and replaces all symbols except for the Scatter to complete winning combinations. If it stops on a Hotline, it expands to cover the entire reel.
The Scatter symbol is a flamingo, appearing only on reels 2, 3, and 4 and rewarding players with seven free spins.
Hotline is the game's main feature, a bonus function that expands symbols on the reels and increases the chances of winning. Experienced players will find Hotline 2 an exciting challenge worthy of their skill.

Review: Hotline 2
For all you crime lovers out there, NetEnt has released a new version of the beloved Hotline slot game! Are you ready to follow the detectives' clues?
Theme and Graphics
NetEnt, the Swedish software company, is one of the best providers in the current market and sets the standard for classic-themed slots with high-quality graphics.
Hotline 2 has a classic but highly effective design, both thematically and graphically. Set in Miami, the slot is reminiscent of the popular 80s TV series Miami Vice. The game features two detectives, resembling Crockett and Tubbs, on the trail of a notorious thief named Kitty Weiss.
The three main characters are present both on the initial screen and as symbols on the reels, with a typical Miami sunset background featuring long streets and palm trees. The colors used are subdued, which not only makes for an appealing graphic design but also creates a relaxing atmosphere.
NetEnt had previously released a slot game called Hotline with similar thematics and graphics. This new version differs primarily in gameplay, introducing new special features along with the "hotlines" that made the game famous.
Main Features of the Slot Game
Hotline 2 follows the traditional slot game structure with five reels and three rows. The game has 243 ways to win, with potential increases up to 1,944 during free spins.
Players can bet a minimum of 10 cents up to a maximum of €50 per spin.
The game's volatility is moderate, and players are likely to secure consistent small wins, but patience is required for substantial payouts. Keep playing, and you could win up to 5,184 times the value of your bet!
Hotline 2 also has a theoretical return to player (RTP) rate of 96%, perfectly average for slot games.
Symbols and Functions of Hotline 2
The symbols on the reels of this crime-themed slot game from NetEnt are entirely thematic and include a range of stolen jewels, detectives, and the alluring thief Kitty Weiss, who offers the highest payouts.
The Wild symbol features two race cars and replaces all symbols except for the Scatter to complete winning combinations. If it stops on a Hotline, it expands to cover the entire reel.
The Scatter symbol is a flamingo, appearing only on reels 2, 3, and 4 and rewarding players with seven free spins.
Hotline is the game's main feature, a bonus function that expands symbols on the reels and increases the chances of winning. Experienced players will find Hotline 2 an exciting challenge worthy of their skill.

The slot game is moderately volatile which means you could collect small wins more frequently than a Tinder match but don't expect to become an overnight millionaire. Review: Hotline 2
For all you crime lovers out there, NetEnt has released a new version of the beloved Hotline slot game! Are you ready to follow the detectives' clues?
Theme and Graphics
NetEnt, the Swedish software company, is one of the best providers in the current market and sets the standard for classic-themed slots with high-quality graphics.
Hotline 2 has a classic but highly effective design, both thematically and graphically. Set in Miami, the slot is reminiscent of the popular 80s TV series Miami Vice. The game features two detectives, resembling Crockett and Tubbs, on the trail of a notorious thief named Kitty Weiss.
The three main characters are present both on the initial screen and as symbols on the reels, with a typical Miami sunset background featuring long streets and palm trees. The colors used are subdued, which not only makes for an appealing graphic design but also creates a relaxing atmosphere.
NetEnt had previously released a slot game called Hotline with similar thematics and graphics. This new version differs primarily in gameplay, introducing new special features along with the "hotlines" that made the game famous.
Main Features of the Slot Game
Hotline 2 follows the traditional slot game structure with five reels and three rows. The game has 243 ways to win, with potential increases up to 1,944 during free spins.
Players can bet a minimum of 10 cents up to a maximum of €50 per spin.
The game's volatility is moderate, and players are likely to secure consistent small wins, but patience is required for substantial payouts. Keep playing, and you could win up to 5,184 times the value of your bet!
Hotline 2 also has a theoretical return to player (RTP) rate of 96%, perfectly average for slot games.
Symbols and Functions of Hotline 2
The symbols on the reels of this crime-themed slot game from NetEnt are entirely thematic and include a range of stolen jewels, detectives, and the alluring thief Kitty Weiss, who offers the highest payouts.
The Wild symbol features two race cars and replaces all symbols except for the Scatter to complete winning combinations. If it stops on a Hotline, it expands to cover the entire reel.
The Scatter symbol is a flamingo, appearing only on reels 2, 3, and 4 and rewarding players with seven free spins.
Hotline is the game's main feature, a bonus function that expands symbols on the reels and increases the chances of winning. Experienced players will find Hotline 2 an exciting challenge worthy of their skill.
